full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYUD THAMS CAD KYI RGYAL PO DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I BSKYED RIM GYI RNAM GZHAG MKHAS PA'I YID 'PHROG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @064B CES DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I BSKYED PA'I RIM @065A *, ,PA LA SLOB BU'I TSUL RNAM PAR BSHAD PA 'DI NI MKHAS GRUB SHES RAB SENG GE DANG, RDO RJE 'DZIN PA SBYIN PA DPAL GNYIS KYIS THUGS SRAS BRGYUD PA RJE BTZUN KUN DGA' DON GRUB KYI GSUNG BSGROS RNYING PA LA GZHI BYAS, CHOS KYI SPYAN LDAN RDO RJE'I SLOB DPON CHOS LDAN BLO GROS KYI GSUNG GIS KHA 'GENG DGOS PA RNAMS BSKANG, RJE NYID KYI RNAM GZHAG t'IKKA DANG MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I BSKYED RIM RNAM BSHAD KYIS CUNG ZAD RGYAS PAR SPROS, BDAG GIS CHOS 'DI'I BKA' DRIN MNOS PA'I YONGS 'DZIN GNYIS KYI GSUNG GIS ZUR NAS BRGYAN, MKHAS PA GZHAN DAG GIS KYANG LEGS PAR BSHAD PA THOS PAS GSEB NAS 'TSANGS TE, PHYOGS GCIG TU SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RDO RJE 'DZIN PA BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS DBEN GNAS BYAMS PA GLING DU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG ,CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL PHYIR DGA' LDAN PHUN TSOGS GLING DU PAR DU SGRUBS, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,
